events.message: I received the wrong size for my order and would like to return it for a refund as soon as possible.
The case has been identified as a refund request because the customer wants to return the product.
Assigning the case to refund specialist Emma for handling the return and refund process.
Hello, I'm Emma from customer support. I'm here to assist you with your refund request for the incorrect item.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the item is unused and in original packaging?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The item is still unused and packed as it arrived.
Thank you for the info. We will arrange a prepaid return label for you and process the refund once we receive the item.
That sounds great, thank you for the quick help and clear instructions for the return.
The return label has been sent to your email, and once we receive the product, we will issue your refund promptly.
We are checking in to confirm you received the return label and if there are any further questions about your refund.
Yes, I received the label and have sent the item back today. Thank you for your help.
We have processed your refund successfully. The amount should appear on your payment method within 3-5 business days.
We have sent a satisfaction survey to understand your experience with our refund process.
The customer has submitted the survey and rated the service as excellent, mentioning appreciative and smooth handling.
Closing the case as the refund has been completed and the customer is satisfied with the resolution.
